interpretation: The "person: beard" card represents a mature and wise individual who has accumulated knowledge through experience. This person exudes confidence and has a commanding presence that demands respect. They are often seen as a mentor or guide, providing guidance to those who seek their wisdom. The beard symbolizes patience, persistence, and perseverance, as it takes time and effort to grow. This card encourages you to embrace your own wisdom and experience, and to share it with others. It reminds you to be patient and persistent in your own growth and development. This card can also indicate a need to seek guidance or advice from a mentor or elder. Keywords associated with this card include wisdom, experience, guidance, patience, persistence, and respect.
